title: Pedagogical Pattern-Based Mathematics Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts, project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Process of designing mathematics learning activities applying pedagogical patterns in smartphone-only environments, where teachers experience flexible and creative design approaches considering real classroom contexts

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more pedagogical patterns when designing learning activities.
Learners can design math projects twice or more, considering student engagement and contextual relevance.
Through collaboration with peer teachers, learners can analyze diverse design approaches and propose improvements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
